SOAP-ENV:Fault.faultstring: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling}systemFault; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:sxeh="http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling" type="sxeh:faultMessage" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part>BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling}systemFault; Fault Data is &lt;?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?&gt;&lt;jbi:message xmlns:sxeh="http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling" type="sxeh:faultMessage" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"&gt;&lt;jbi:part&gt;BPJBI-6018: EndPoint Reference is not available from the JBI corresponding to the service name {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/ProcessManagerSimple/processManagerSimple}WACAgency and endpoint name WACDivingAgencyPortTypeRole_partnerRole&lt;/jbi:part&gt;&lt;/jbi:message&gt;.
